net.sf.jailer.subsetting

Interface TransformerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeletionTransformer.Factory, DMLTransformer.Factory, FlatXMLTransformer.Factory, LiquibaseXMLTransformer.Factory

    public interface TransformerFactory
    Creates transformer (as Session.ResultSetReader which transforms rows into an external representation.
    Author:
    Ralf Wisser

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Session.ResultSetReader create(Table table)
      Creates transformer (as Session.ResultSetReader which transforms rows of a given table into an external representation.
